lines:
1956

goptaber 20, 1910,

Mr. T. C. Kuan,

Chiness legation,

Washington, D. Co

Dear Sir:

Allow as to thank you for your note roesİNad this morning, Mr. Kwan 
had already told me that you had given up the ides of coning to Andover this

ya7, 89 I was not uprepared to receive your letter.

With kindast ragards and the best of wishes to you, heliora mo

Sincerely yours,

Principal,
raw: 1956 goptaber 20, 1910, Mr. T. C. Kuan, Chiness legation, Washington, D. Co Dear Sir: Allow as to thank you for your note roesİNad this morning, Mr. Kwan had already told me that you had given up the ides of coning to Andover this ya7, 89 I was not uprepared to receive your letter. With kindast ragards and the best of wishes to you, heliora mo Sincerely yours, Principal,

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter stating that Stearns had already heard that T.C. Kwan will not attend Andover from Mr. Kwan.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
